document.heading: 14W AND ANTHONY BOWEN YMCA PROJECT TAX ABATEMENT IMPLEMENTATION CLARIFICATION ACT OF 2010.

history.narrative: Law 18-320, the “14W and Anthony Bowen YMCA Project Tax Abatement Implementation Clarification Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-898, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2010, and November 23, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 9, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-641 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-320 became effective on March 12,
